title: Training for the last run

abstract: This time it was a race to survive.
description: Commonwealth gold medallist Raelene Boyle faced her toughest challenge in the fight against breast cancer. 'My breast cancer diagnosis in 1996 did see me race again. This time it was a race to survive'. Created in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop 'Journeys with Breast Cancer' in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia.
